protocol.text: Root tissues were protoplasted according to [Iyer-Pascuzzi, A. S. & Benfey, P. N. Fluorescence-activated cell sorting in plant developmental biology. Methods Mol Biol. 655, 313-319 (2010)].

Plants were grown on square plates (Greiner Labortechnik) with solid medium derived from standard MS medium incubated in a growth chamber under continuous light (110 μE.m-2.s-1 photosynthetically active radiation, supplied by cool-white fluorescent tungsten tubes; Osram) at 22�C.
Root tissues were protoplasted according to [Iyer-Pascuzzi, A. S. & Benfey, P. N. Fluorescence-activated cell sorting in plant developmental biology. Methods Mol Biol. 655, 313-319 (2010)].

text: Labeling and hybridisation was done according to Affymetrics protocols (
